text: Francesco Antonio Caneti (1652–1721) was an Italian miniature painter of the Baroque period. He was born at Cremona, where he was a pupil of Giovanni Battista Natali. He afterwards became a Capuchin friar. ==References== * Category:1652 births Category:1721 deaths Category:People from Cremona Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:18th-century Italian painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Cremonese painters
title: Francesco Antonio Caneti
